item.title: コロンビア大学ジャーナリズムスクール、非営利メディアで働く新卒者に5年間で最大5万ドルのローン返済支援プログラムを発表（コロンビア大学ジャーナリズムスクール）
item.description:
Columbia Journalism School:
Columbia Journalism School announces a loan repayment assistance program to provide recent graduates working in nonprofit media up to $50K over five years  —  The program is the first of its kind for graduate journalism schools.  With its inception, Columbia continues to stake its claim …

item.title: SAG-AFTRAは、6月7日に設定されたスタジオとの交渉開始前にもストライキを承認し、「最大限の交渉力を発揮する」よう会員に要請する（Anousha Sakoui/Los Angeles Times）。
item.description:
Anousha Sakoui / Los Angeles Times:
SAG-AFTRA asks its members to authorize a strike even before it starts negotiations with studios, set for June 7, to give it “maximum bargaining leverage”  —  In a sign of escalating labor relations in Hollywood, SAG-AFTRA is asking its 160,000 members to authorize a strike …

item.title: クリスティアン・アマンプールは、トランプのタウンホールをめぐってCNNのクリス・リヒトCEOと「強固な意見交換」をしたと語り、公に反対意見を述べた最初のCNNキャスターとなった（Oliver Darcy/CNN)
item.description:
Oliver Darcy / CNN:
Christiane Amanpour says she had a “robust exchange of views” with CNN CEO Chris Licht over Trump's town hall, becoming the first CNN anchor to dissent publicly  —  It has been one week since CNN's town hall with Donald Trump — and the fierce fallout stemming from the event is still reverberating.

item.title: LLMが音楽とレコーディングアーティストに与える影響を徹底検証！2004年のボーカロイド初ソフト、初音ミク、ドレイク、ルイ・アームストロングを振り返る（Jaime Brooks/The Seat of Loss)
item.description:
Jaime Brooks / The Seat of Loss:
An in-depth look at the impact of LLMs on music and recording artists, reflecting on Vocaloid's first software in 2004, Hatsune Miku, Drake, and Louis Armstrong  —  A comprehensive guide to ghostwriters, virtual pop stars, and the world to come.  —  Recently, the New York Times published …

item.title: YouTube、TVでトップパフォーマンスの動画に30秒のスキップ不可広告を公開、2022年12月に150M以上の米国ユニーク視聴者がTVでYouTubeまたはYouTube TVを視聴したと発表（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
YouTube unveils 30-second unskippable ads on top-performing videos on TVs and says 150M+ unique US viewers watched YouTube or YouTube TV on TVs in December 2022  —  Google's video giant says it reaches more than 150 million U.S. monthly viewers on TV screens

item.title: ドキュメントです：Googleは新しいAIモデルを広告やカスタマーサービス、YouTubeクリエイターの支援に使う予定で、社内でStable Diffusionのような製品を開発している（Jennifer Elias/CNBC)
item.description:
Jennifer Elias / CNBC:
Docs: Google plans to use new AI models for ads, customer service, and to help YouTube creators, and is working on an internal Stable Diffusion-like product  —  - Google has approved several ad-related artificial intelligence projects to help advertisers and YouTube creators, internal documents show.

item.title: NYの裁判所は、Gawkerを復活させるために雇われた編集者Carson Griffithが起こしたMaxwell Tani、The Daily Beast、Noah Shachtmanに対する2020年の名誉毀損訴訟を棄却した（Jacob Shamsian/Insider） 。
item.description:
Jacob Shamsian / Insider:
A NY court dismisses a 2020 defamation suit against Maxwell Tani, The Daily Beast, and Noah Shachtman filed by Carson Griffith, an editor hired to revive Gawker  —  - A defamation lawsuit against The Daily Beast was dismissed by a New York appeals court.  — The suit was filed …

item.title: モンタナ州知事Greg Gianforteが、州内でTikTokを禁止する国内初の法案に署名、2024年1月1日施行予定（Wall Street Journal)
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Montana Governor Greg Gianforte signs the country's first bill that bans TikTok in a state, set to go into effect on January 1, 2024  —  Ban is slated to take effect next year—if it survives expected litigation  —  Montana's governor signed the country's first bill that outright bans TikTok …

item.title: Netflixによると、広告ティアは、ローンチ後6ヶ月で、34歳の中央値で、約5MのグローバルMAUを持ち、オプションがある国でサインアップの25％以上を占める（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
Netflix says its ad tier has nearly 5M global MAUs, with a median age of 34, six months after launch, and makes up 25%+ of signups in countries with the option  —  In its inaugural upfront advertising event, executives touted the the streaming service's growing ad tier, and unveiled new sponsorship options.

item.title: 5月16日、ニューヨークのチャリティイベントを終えたハリー王子とメーガン・マークルを乗せた車をカメラマンが追いかけ、一時的に警察署に避難させた（AP通信）。
item.description:
Associated Press:
Photographers pursued a car carrying Prince Harry and Meghan Markle after a NYC charity event on May 16, forcing them to briefly take refuge in a police station  —  Prince Harry and his wife, Meghan, were trailed in their car by photographers as they left a New York City charity event Tuesday night …

item.title: ニュースメディア協会は、Googleが英国のパブリッシャーに送るトラフィックは、Google UKの£100B+の広告収入のうち、年間収入で75Mポンド以下の価値があると推定している（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
The News Media Association estimates the traffic Google sends to UK publishers is worth less than £75M in annual revenue, out of Google UK's £10B+ ad revenue  —  Publishers and platforms disagree over how much they each benefit from each other.  —  UK publishers have accused Google …

item.title: ラクラン・マードック氏は、Foxが勝っていたであろう気が散るような長い法廷闘争を避けるためにDominionと和解したと述べ、Tucker Carlsonを落としたことを擁護している（Ted Johnson/Deadline)
item.description:
Ted Johnson / Deadline:
Lachlan Murdoch says Fox settled with Dominion to avoid a distracting, long legal battle, which he says Fox would have won, and defends dropping Tucker Carlson  —  Fox Corporation CEO Lachlan Murdoch compared CNN's town hall last week with Donald Trump to Fox News' post-2020 election coverage …

item.title: FoxのCEOであるLachlan Murdoch氏は、同社のニュースやプレミアムスポーツ番組にとって、ケーブルテレビと衛星放送が最高の消費者価値とリーチを提供すると今でも考えていると述べている（Matthew Keys/Fierce Video）。
item.description:
Matthew Keys / Fierce Video:
Fox CEO Lachlan Murdoch says the company still thinks cable and satellite TV offer the best consumer value and reach for its news and premium sports programs  —  Fox Tubi TV linear television sports  —  Fox Corporation CEO Lachlan Murdoch said the media company still believes traditional cable …

item.title: ワーナー・ブラザース・ディスカバリーは、マーケターが自社のネットワークやプラットフォームからデジタルビデオの在庫にアクセスできる社内プログラマティック・プラットフォーム「WBD Stream」を立ち上げました（Wayne Friedman/MediaPost）
item.description:
Wayne Friedman / MediaPost:
Warner Bros. Discovery launches WBD Stream, an in-house programmatic platform that lets marketers access digital video inventory from its networks and platforms  —  Warner Bros. Discovery is starting up an in-house supply-side programmatic platform (SSP) called WBD Stream …

item.title: ESPNやNetflixなどの番組を制作しているPeyton ManningのOmaha Productionsが、Peter CherninのNorth Roadから$400M以上の評価額で〜$10Mを調達した（Lucas Shaw/Bloomberg)
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
Peyton Manning's Omaha Productions, which is producing shows for ESPN, Netflix, and others, raised ~$10M from Peter Chernin's North Road at a $400M+ valuation  —  Josh Pyatt and Jamie Horowitz flew to Denver in September 2020 armed with a pitch deck and a prayer.
